description: Commands to manage gateway route configs in Azure Spring Cloud.

commands.name: az spring-cloud gateway route-config create
commands.summary: Create a gateway route config with routing rules of Json array format.
examples: az spring-cloud gateway route-config create -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup --name MyName --app-name MyApp --routes-file MyJson.json

commands.name: az spring-cloud gateway route-config list
commands.summary: List all existing gateway route configs.
examples: az spring-cloud gateway route-config list -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup

commands.name: az spring-cloud gateway route-config remove
commands.summary: Delete an existing gateway route config.
examples: az spring-cloud gateway route-config remove -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup --name MyName

commands.name: az spring-cloud gateway route-config show
commands.summary: Get an existing gateway route config.
examples: az spring-cloud gateway route-config show -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup --name MyName

commands.name: az spring-cloud gateway route-config update
commands.summary: Update an existing gateway route config with routing rules of Json array format.
examples: az spring-cloud gateway route-config update -s MyService -g MyResourceGroup --name MyName --app-name MyApp --routes-file MyJson.json
